words.w: The watch which is on the table belongs to the teacher.
4. We have learnt كِتَابُكَ "your book". Now note هَذَا كِتَابُكَ أَنْتَ "this is your book". Here أَنْتَ has been added for emphasis. This is used in case of doubt or dispute. Note also :
هَذَا بَيْتُهُ هُوَ. هَذَا قَلَمِي أَنَا. ذَلِكَ كِتَابُهَا هِيَ
